channel.title: Determining the last changeset
channel.description: We've just been having a discussion internally about ways of numbering our builds.  It seems a sensible idea to qualify a build with the changeset number in our TFS repository, that way we are able to easily identify the exact...
channel.dc:creator: Martin

item.title: Comment by Richard Berg+00:00
item.description: There's also the little known "tf changeset /latest /i". It's easy to forget because Changeset is the only command that uses the /latest switch.
item.dc:creator: Richard Berg

item.title: Comment by Martin+00:00
item.description: Cool, cheers Richard - I hadn't seen the /latest switch.
item.dc:creator: Martin
